text:
@GOP This White House can't even come up w/a federal plan to keep the Coronavirus controlled. Yet, we're supposed to be able to trust their handling of vaccine production and distribution? 

Thankfully, by the time there is a vaccine, Trump & his incompetent admin will be gone.
